text: Before Midnight is a 2013 American romantic drama movie. Ethan Hawke stars as Jesse Wallace and Julie Delpy as Celine. This movie is set in Greece. Before Midnight has gotten strong praise from the movie critics. It was released during May and June of 2013 in the United States. It was preceded by Before Sunrise and Before Sunset. == Other websites == * Category:2013 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Greek movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies set in Greece Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Linklater Category:2013 independent movies
title: Before Midnight
